title: Bacon Cheeseburger Pizza
directions: Cook beef and onion in a large skillet over medium heat until meat is no longer pink; drain and set aside.

Place crust on an ungreased 12-in. pizza pan. Spread with pizza sauce. Top with beef mixture, bacon, pickles and cheeses. Sprinkle with pizza seasoning. Bake at 450Â° for 8-10 minutes or until cheese is melted. Yield: 8 slices.
ingredients: 2 cups (8 ounces) shredded part-skim mozzarella cheese
